alert.note: Alert for Culpeper; Greene; Madison; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Page; Rappahannock; Rockingham; Southern Fauquier (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 12 at 7:04PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia, northern Virginia, northwest Virginia and western Virginia, including the following areas: in central Virginia, Greene. In northern Virginia, Culpeper and Southern Fauquier. In northwest Virginia, Madison, Northern Virginia Blue Ridge, Page and Rappahannock. In western Virginia, Rockingham. * WHEN...Until Midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Repetitive thunderstorms will continue across the area through this evening. Heavy rain will accompany a number of these storms which may drop 1 to 2 inches of rainfall in an hour, with locally higher totals possible in areas that see multiple storms. - For more information, visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Culpeper; Greene; Madison; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Page; Rappahannock; Rockingham; Southern Fauquier
